statements: UPDATE dna_sequence_alignments SET alignment_score = 90.5, sequence_data = 'ATCGATCG', length = 8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dna_sequence_alignments SET length = 10, sequence_data = 'GCTAGCTA', alignment_score = 85.7 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE dna_sequence_alignments SET alignment_score = 98.75, sequence_data = 'ACGT', length = 4 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dna_sequence_alignments SET length = length + 5, alignment_score = 85.6 WHERE sequence_data LIKE '%ATG%';
UPDATE dna_sequence_alignments SET sequence_data = 'GATTACA' WHERE sequence_name = 'seq1';
UPDATE evolutionary_studies SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', study_name = 'Study A' WHERE study_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE dna_sequence_alignments SET sequence_data = 'ATCGTACGATCG' WHERE alignment_id = '99cd3b43-d2d0-41c4-8539-cd9d30b4afc8';

UPDATE evolutionary_studies SET researcher_name = 'Dr. Jane Doe', study_name = 'Genetic Evolution Study', analysis_results = '{"mutation_analysis": "high", "evolutionary_timeline": "1000 years"}' WHERE study_id = 'a122c588-f6e3-4bbd-8351-21be41a7dc79';
UPDATE DNA_Sequences SET sequence = 'ACGT' WHERE sequence_id = 1;
UPDATE Studies SET study_description = 'Updated description' WHERE study_id = 2;
UPDATE DNA_Sequences SET sequence = 'AGCTAGCTAGCT' WHERE sequence_id = 1;
UPDATE Alignments SET alignment = 'AG-TTAGCTAGCT' WHERE alignment_id = 3;
UPDATE alignment_sequences SET score = 9.2 WHERE alignment_id = 1 AND sequence_id = 5;
UPDATE alignment_metadata SET alignment_name = 'New Alignment' WHERE alignment_id = 4;
UPDATE alignment_sequences SET score = 9.5 WHERE alignment_id = 100 AND sequence_id = 500

UPDATE alignment_sequences SET sequence='ATCG' WHERE alignment_id=1;
UPDATE alignment_scores SET score=98.5 WHERE alignment_id=2;
UPDATE alignment_sequences SET sequence = 'ATCGGCTA' WHERE alignment_id = 1;
